ARABIC: وَعَجِبُوٓا۟ أَن جَآءَهُم مُّنذِرٌ مِّنْهُمْ وَقَالَ ٱلْكَٰفِرُونَ هَٰذَا سَٰحِرٌ كَذَّابٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They are surprised that a warner should come to them from among themselves. The kuffar say, This is a lying magician.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They were surprised that one of them had come to them as warner; and the unbelievers said: "He is a deceiving sorcerer.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They wondered that a warner had come to them from among themselves, and the deniers of the Truth said: “This is a sorcerer, and a big liar.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: It seems strange to the pagans that a man from their own people should come to them as a Prophet. The unbelievers have said, "He is only a lying magician".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And they were surprised that a Herald of Warning came to them from among themselves; and the disbelievers said, “He is a magician, a great liar!”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And they wonder that a warner has come to them from among themselves. And the disbelievers say: "This is a sorcerer, a liar."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And they wonder that there has come to them a warner from among themselves, and the disbelievers say: This is an enchanter, a liar.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Now they marvel that a warner has come to them from among them; and the unbelievers say, 'This is a lying sorcerer.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And they marvel that a warner from among themselves hath come unto them, and the disbelievers say: This is a wizard, a charlatan.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They are surprised that a warner should come to them from among themselves. They say, "This is a magician, a great liar.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And they marvel that there should come Unto them a warner from among themselves. And the infidels say: this is a magician and a liar!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They consider it odd that there should come to them a warner from among themselves, and the faithless say, ‘This is a magician, a mendacious liar.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So they wonder that a Warner has come to them from among themselves! and the Unbelievers say, "This is a sorcerer telling lies!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And they (Arab pagans) wonder that a warner (Prophet Muhammad SAW) has come to them from among themselves! And the disbelievers say: "This (Prophet Muhammad SAW) is a sorcerer, a liar.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They marvel now that, from among themselves, a warner has come to them. The unbelievers say: 'This is a lying sorcerer.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And they marveled that a warner has come to them from among them. The disbelievers said, “This is a lying magician.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And they wonder that there has come to them a warner from among themselves. And the disbelievers say, "This is a magician and a liar.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [38:4] And they marvel that a warner has come to them from among themselves, a messenger from among their number, to warn them and to threaten them with [the punishment of] the Fire after resurrection — and this [warner] is the Prophet (s). And those who disbelieve (the overt noun [al-kāfirūnā] has replaced the [third person] pronominalisation) say, ‘This is a sorcerer, a liar.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And they) i.e. the Quraysh (marvel that a warner) a warning messenger (from among themselves) from their own lineage (hath come unto them, and the disbelievers) the disbelievers of Mecca (say: This) meaning Muhammad (pbuh) (is a wizard) who sows dispute between people, (a charlatan) who lies about Allah.
